title: Episode 760 - Talkin' Stonks with Julio Salazar
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined in studio by Chicago artist and photographer Julio Salazar to talk about Julio’s custom Dave Chappelle painting Ross commissioned, his most popular work including his Kobe Bryant painting and Star Wars art — plu...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined in studio by Chicago artist and photographer Julio Salazar to talk about Julio’s custom Dave Chappelle painting Ross commissioned, his most popular work including his Kobe Bryant painting and Star Wars art — plus Ross and Dan continue to break down the GameStop and AMC stock market situation.

 

ghostbed.com/drinkinbros

description:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined in studio by Chicago artist and photographer Julio Salazar to talk about Julio’s custom Dave Chappelle painting Ross commissioned, his most popular work including his Kobe Bryant painting and Star Wars art — plus Ross and Dan continue to break down the GameStop and AMC stock market situation.
